cmp: 由 (follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/by/to/to leave it (to sb))
mng: sleeve, to tuck inside one's sleeve

exm.mng: sleeve, to tuck inside one's sleeve
to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
spiritual leader (of a nation or church), religious leader
homosexual, see 斷袖之癖|断袖之癖[duan4 xiu4 zhi1 pi3]
